News.headline: Final Postage Dates For Daggers Online Shop
News.page_title: Final Postage Dates For Daggers Online Shop
News.URL_keywords: Final Postage Dates For Daggers Online Shop
News.short_description: Information regarding final postage dates to order off the Daggers online shop
News.description:
Please see below for the information regarding the last dates for orders to be delivered in time for Christmas day.

The last date and time guaranteed for an order to be delivered before Christmas Day is Wednesday 21st December at 1pm.

Click hereto go to our online shop.

Alternatively the Daggers shop will be open this week before Christmas for fans wishing to get presents for any Daggers fans. Click here for a full list of opening times for this week.
